<sky>.name: Sky
<sky>.info: A charming actor with a youthful vibe, he balances playful charisma with subtle emotional depth. His expressive gestures add charm to every public appearance.

<sunghoon>.name: Sunghoon
<sunghoon>.info: With a soft yet structured look, he carries a calm elegance suited for both romantic and introspective roles. His poised posture conveys confidence and sensitivity.

<wei>.name: Wei
<wei>.info: He exudes quiet strength and sophistication, often portraying serious and intense characters. His minimalist style enhances his charismatic presence.

<lim>.name: Lim
<lim>.info: With a youthful and sincere look, he brings realism and relatability to his roles. His office-style portrayal highlights everyday charm and depth.
